original_text: The governor again said to them, “Which of the two do you want me to release for you?” And they said, “Barabbas.”
korean_text: 총독이 대답하여 이르되 둘 중의 누구를 너희에게 놓아 주기를 원하느냐 이르되 바라바로소이다

sentences.original_text: The governor again said to them,
“Which of the two do you want me to release for you?”
sentences.korean_translation: “둘 중에 누구를 당신들을 위해 풀어주기를 원하십니까?”
